entries.content: Starting UI ultra-modular refactoring session. User (Moti) wants to refactor modules in the UI. Reviewing recent memory shows we've successfully applied ultra-modular pattern to: chat-tabs CSS, messages-list CSS, message-list handlers (JS), tool-use CSS. Pattern: monolithic files â†’ orchestrator + micro-components with single responsibility.

Analyzing UserUIController.js (264 lines) for ultra-modular refactoring. Current structure: Main controller manages send button, state changes, message enrichment, clipboard widgets. Has sub-controllers: UserInputController, MessageEnricher. Mixed concerns: DOM management, event handling, state management, message enrichment orchestration, clipboard lifecycle, UI state transitions. Good candidate for orchestrator pattern.

Successfully completed ultra-modular refactoring of UserUIController.js. Transformed 264-line monolithic file into orchestrator + 14 focused micro-components. Build passed with no errors. Architecture: DOM layer (2), State layer (3), Handler layer (4), Coordination layer (2), Lifecycle layer (1), Orchestrator (1). All components follow single responsibility principle. Original backed up to UserUIController.original.js.
